title: Phase 0: wong-prime - pull closed dependency code into current workspace
description:
Add wong-prime command that copies a closed dependency's committed files into the current workspace. This is the minimum viable fix for q8 (agents can't share code).

Steps:
1. Add change_id and files fields to types.Issue
2. Update wong-close to record change_id from jj log -r @ -T change_id
3. Implement Prime(ctx, depID) in Go: verify closed, read change_id, jj file show each file
4. Implement PrimeAll(ctx, issueID) in Go: prime all closed blocking deps
5. Implement wong-prime and wong-prime-all in shell
6. Unit tests (no jj) + integration tests (jj)

See wongs/EPIC-STACKED-DIFFS.md for full design.
